title: They may as well make SKT skins for every champion!
body:
It was a good try MISFITS, you got it to game 5.

I was looking forward to different skins, but oh well.

I wonder if riot should make second place sometimes have the skins instead, if first place already has one (Or a billion in this case)

replies.body: My predictions: SKT Jayce, SKT Tristana, SKT Sejuani, SKT Taliyah, SKT Jarvan and SKT Lulu
I think that list is  a little too small!

Omg...

We were wrong... SKT actually lost to SSG.

I'm lost for words. And happy. No more goddamn SKT skins.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I would love an SKT Evelynn ‚ù§
